name: Flaplet's Way Home
description:
Little droplet Flaplet want's to go back home, could you help it find the way?

Move using WASD and Spacebar

This game was made for theCommunity Game Jam of August 2019, the theme was "The game is a liar".  

Everything except for the font was made by Cindy Espíndola, tools used: Unity, Medibang Paint Pro, Krita.
